title: New: Kult Country – Slowburn
body:
After the announcement of their first headline show at the Islington Mill, **Kult Country** have followed with the release of a new track, **_Slowburn_**.

It’s not exactly revolutionary, but it’s heady, large and overblown in the right places.

Check out the video/track below and buy tickets for the upcoming show [here.](http://www.seetickets.com/Event/KULT-COUNTRY/Islington-Mill/671670)

It’s not exactly revolutionary, but it’s heady, large and overblown in the right places. Check out the video/track below and buy tickets for the upcoming show here.
